title: "How did the Idealistic vision of Christian Reconstruction of Canon Mouls Fail?"
first_phrase: In the last 200 tokens of this text, the story moves on to talk about Mouls' attempts to establish a new kind of religion that was more tolerant and without the rigid dogmatic structures of the Catholic Church. However, his attempts failed, and he was not suited to command such a monumental undertaking. Despite his good intentions, Mouls lacked the charisma and imposing personality required to lead a new religious movement. Instead, he devoted himself to the study and practice of human magnetism, but even in this new path, he experienced many setbacks.
content: Malgré scs grands mérites, le chanoine Mouls, il faut savoir le reconnaître, n’était pas de taille à soulever jusqu’au faîte de l’édifice les immenses matériaux d’une église. Fatalement, il fallait qu’il succombât sous de si formidables fardeaux. Il était de la race de ceux qui obéissent, non de ceux qui commandent \ de ceux qui s’inclinent, non de ceux qui ordonnent ; de ceux qui espèrent, non de ceux qui veulent. [2] » Il n’était pourvu ni do l'orgueil impérieux des esprits dominateurs, ni du prestigieux génie des intelligences créatrices, ni do l’autorité souveraine des maîtres. Dans son âme s’associait plutôt le zèle du néophyte à l’humble dévouement de l’obscur apôtre. » Quand ses rêves de rénovations religieuses furent envolés, Mouls se consacra exclusivement h l’étude, puis à la pratique du magnétisme humain. Mais dans cette voie nouvelle, il essuya de cruels déboires.
last_phrase: In conclusion, the life of the humble scholar and devoted apostle, the Canon Mouls, teaches us that sometimes our dreams may not become reality, and we must adapt to new paths. Despite his merits, he could not bear the weight of his ambitious projects, but found solace in the study of human magnetism. His selflessness and dedication to his work made him live a life of minimalistic means, but one that was full of purpose and devotion.
